        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            show.transcript_dropdown=false
          
          
            
            # show.transcript_dropdown=false
          
      
    
    
  

Good to comment this one out. In case we want to make it enabled by default at some point people don't have to update their properties file (in case they copied over the EXAMPLE file)
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -187,6 +187,9 @@ show.civic=false
 # Link to My Cancer Genome. Please disable (set to false) when using cBioPortal with patient identifiable data due My Cancer Genome license restrictions.
 mycancergenome.show=true
 
+# Enable transcript switch dropdown (true, false)
+show.transcript_dropdown=false

@@ -187,6 +187,9 @@ show.civic=false
 # Link to My Cancer Genome. Please disable (set to false) when using cBioPortal with patient identifiable data due My Cancer Genome license restrictions.
 mycancergenome.show=true

nodes.bodyText: @leexgh just noticed typo here: show.mutation_mappert_tool.grch38. Should be show.mutation_mapper_tool.grch38. Can be addressed in separate PR (good to update docs as well)
